hero.headline: Charless Netumbare | Umuntu Oqeqeshwe Ekusebenziseni Ikhompiyutha Nokufunda Izinto Ezintsha
hero.subline: Ngenza izinto eziphakamileyo zeFintec, ngifunda i-robotics, nokuxhuma amandla omzimba nomqondo wobuchwepheshe. Ngihlala eHarare, Africa.

about.title: Mayelana Nami
about.intro: Ngingumuntu oneminyaka 24 oqeqeshwe ekusebenziseni ikhompiyutha ngokuphelele futhi ngingumuntu obheke ibhola (1.9m) ovela eHarare, Africa. Ngikhuluma ngokusebenza kahle, ukufunda ngokushesha, nokukwenza umsebenzi omuhle.

questbook.title: Shiya Umcabango
questbook.description: Cabanga ngezinto zakho ushiye umcabango kimi
questbook.thankYou: Ngiyabonga! Umcabango wakho wathumelwe. Ngizokubuyela emva.

common.role: Umuntu Oqeqeshwe Ekusebenziseni Ikhompiyutha Nokufunda Izinto Ezintsha
